input_text:
Job Title: Junior Network Engineer

Location: Houston, TX

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Advertising, Engineering, Information Technology

Description:
Junior Network Engineer
Location: Houston, TX
Overview:The Network Engineer will be responsible for the management, configuration, and troubleshooting of network infrastructure across a wide geographical enterprise environment. This role involves significant hands-on work and collaboration with a team of experienced engineers to ensure operational excellence and the achievement of all technical goals.
Responsibilities:- Diagnose and resolve complex network issues to maintain high service levels and minimize downtime.- Perform routine inspections and maintenance of network systems to ensure functionality and efficiency.- Deploy, configure, and optimize network devices including routers, switches, firewalls, and other related technologies.- Participate in the design and implementation of new network solutions to support organizational growth and technological advancement.- Provide technical support and guidance remotely for field technicians and other network users.- Engage in continuous learning to stay abreast of new technologies and practices that may benefit the organization.- Document all operational procedures and configurations to assist in quick resolution of future issues and to maintain business continuity.- Collaborate effectively with team members and other departments on technology projects and issues.- Undertake special projects and additional responsibilities as required.


Essential Skills and Qualifications:- In-depth knowledge of Cisco route/switch technologies, Palo Alto firewalls, and Cisco Umbrella operations.- Proven ability to troubleshoot and resolve network issues effectively.- Comprehensive understanding of routing protocols, network security, and wireless technologies.- Experience with Python scripting for network automation is highly desirable.- Excellent organizational skills and the ability to manage multiple priorities in a fast-paced environment.- Strong communication skills, capable of working constructively with diverse teams.- Ability to physically install network hardware and perform maintenance activities as needed.
Physical Requirements:- Ability to perform physically demanding tasks such as lifting up to 80 pounds, bending, and crawling during installations and maintenance.
Education and Experience:- Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or a related field.- At least 5 years of relevant experience in network engineering.- Industry certifications (e.g., CCNA, Palo Alto Certifications) are advantageous but not required.
Work Conditions:- This position requires on-site presence for at least three days per week to foster teamwork and cultural integration.- Must be available to travel occasionally as required by the role.
Benefits:- Competitive salary package including comprehensive health, dental, and vision insurance.- Generous vacation and paid time off (PTO), plus paid holidays.- Retirement savings plan with company match.- Professional development and training opportunities.

Experience Level (if available): Associate
